body.section:
You may be asked to speculate on future developments. What is important here is not to have a prepared answer, but to have phrases to help you speculate. Here are some phrases to use when speculating on future developments:- Maybe - Perhaps- I hope- It would be good if......- We can't tell
Strategies
1.Practise speculating on your own when, for example, you listen to the news. What might happen? How much can you foretell? What are the various possibilities?
Practise comparing different versions of the news, or different aspects of your life. Get used to the phrases we use for these functions.
